RT @bazmcstay: The bat's out of the bag. I've written a play for @VAULTFestival, directed by the fab @lucypapoosky & produced by @JessDux.â€¦
#Vespertilio was inspired in part by this beautiful long read in the @guardian, by Patrick Barkham, about Britain's Loneliest Animal https://t.co/OCORmdViNv

We are also being given lots of support and advice from the Bat Conservation Trust @_BCT_ who do incredible work to save these beautiful and oft misunderstood creatures https://t.co/ciTpUhuhTw #Vespertilio

That's right guys, i'm heading back to @VAULTFestival like a bat returning to her roost. Directing a heartbreakingly beautiful new play, @VespertilioPlay, by the incredible @bazmcstay, produced by @JessDux. Tickets are on sale NOW! https://t.co/0jf4useRwt
